Pre-Game Insights: Christopher Morel will take the field for the Tampa Bay Rays versus Ben Lively and the Cleveland Guardians on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Morel has hit a team-best 21 home runs this season.
Morel is 0-for-3 against Ben Lively in his career.
Morel has recorded a hit 80 times this season in 140 games played (57.1%), including 19 multi-hit games (13.6%).
He has homered in 14.3% of his games this season (140 contests), leaving the ballpark in 3.7% of his plate appearances.
In 33.6% of his games this year (47 of 140), Morel has scored at least one run, and in eight of those games (5.7%) he recorded more than one run scored.

Morel has gone down on strikes at least once 97 times this season in 140 games played (69.3%), including 46 times striking out multiple times (32.9%).
Others: Ben Lively (11-9) will make his 27th start of the season for the Guardians.
He is 11-9 with a 4.01 ERA and 110 Ks through 137 2/3 innings pitched.
Lively's last time out came on Tuesday versus the Chicago White Sox, as he tossed two scoreless innings while allowing just one hit.
